channel.title: Blog Posts on AI & Systems on Uday | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts on AI & Systems on Uday | Portfolio

item.title: How I Built an AI System That Understood ONDC Taxonomy
item.description: A deep dive into the technical challenges and solutions for creating a retrieval-augmented generation system that can understand and navigate complex product taxonomies.

item.title: AI Tools Fail When You Forget the Human Layer
item.description: Reflections on why the most successful AI applications are those that thoughtfully integrate human expertise and workflow rather than trying to replace it entirely.

item.title: Product is Applied Systems Design
item.description: An exploration of how systems thinking principles can transform product development and lead to more resilient, adaptable solutions.
